Justification: To assess for anemia, infection, or other blood abnormalities.
To rule out hypothyroidism, a common cause of fatigue.
Vitamin D deficiency can contribute to fatigue.
To assess for iron deficiency anemia.
To check for electrolyte imbalances or kidney function issues.
To rule out urinary tract infection or other urinary abnormalities.
To assess for sleep disorders, such as sleep apnea, which can cause fatigue.
